channel.title: The Chart
channel.description:
Okay i noticed I've been helpin people alot but they have'nt repped me so i've come up with a chart. I know this seems Pwnd like but it would help people out. Please consider using this it would make people like Javacisnotrecoginozed, Mod Tharock, Darth Afro, DAWWIG feel appreciated.
Suggested Reward _____________________________ Any spawning command = 1 rep Any 10 monsters (w/o cords) = 1 rep Any 5 monsters (w/ cords) = 1 rep Any teleporting command = 1 rep Any complex code (pickup,noclip,ect) = silver mod on server Feeling nooby? Credits to Pwnd for this one. (asking where to find Client.Java, ect) = 1 rep Any very complex code (new skill,ect) = gold mod on server Any Cave (Waterbirth, Thzaar, ect) = silver mod on server Shops = 1 rep Training spot = 1 rep or silver mod on server
Think it's a good idea or just think it's stupid post here but keep in mind this system could help you too

item.title: The Chart
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“IcyPimp, post:6, topic:21121”]I think the chart should look like this:

Suggested Reward

Anytime Icy says “Berder” = 1 rep (for Icy)
Anytime Icy powns someone with sophisticated language = 1 rep (for Icy)
Anytime Icy spells a word out in 1337 format = 1 rep (for Icy)
Anytime Icy gets owned by someone else = 10 rep (for Icy)[/quote]I’m with you!

Read full topic

item.title: The Chart
item.dc:creator: @Slain Slain
item.description:
@Slain wrote:

Unknown read the rules http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3.0.html

4. We don't make posts that contain unuseful information. Posts like "cool", "lol", "yeah" and "I agree" don't contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.

Read full topic
